director.name: 纳查妮·吉拉隆罗伊 Natchanit Jirarungroj

this_title: มักกะลีที่รัก
introduction: Tankul是一名天文学教师，他发现了一名赤裸的昏迷女孩，并决定保护她，认为她受到了攻击。她醒来后，Tankul注意到她说话和行为像个孩子。她身上一点抓痕都没有，看起来好像连骨头都没有。这时他意识到他救下的女孩是一个马卡里人——通过一个洞来到这里假以时日。很快，他们的关系变得浪漫。然而，人类和马卡里人之间的爱情故事能有多简单呢？Tankul, an astronomy teacher, finds a naked unconscious girl and decides to protect her thinking that she's been assaulted.After she wakes up, Tankul notices that she talks and behaves like a child. She does not have a single scratch on her body, and it looks like she doesn't even have bones.This is when he realises that the girl he has rescued is a makkali —having arrived here through a hole in time.Soon, their relationship becomes romantic.  However, just how easy can a love story between a human and a makkali be?
foreign_title: มักกะลีที่รัก
